about1: Tyron originates from a critical and conscious view of the damage that some technologies (their human utility) cause to nature. The founder of the Tyron SSI Protocol graduated in petroleum engineering, and during his professional career, he learned about the effects of this extractive industry. His experience allowed him to understand that behind the exploitation of natural resources lies a logic of domination and commodification of nature for the economic benefit of a few people.
about2: TYRON, a decentralized network of Self-sovereign identities, was created in these circumstances. The word tyron derives from the Greek turannos, meaning 'sovereign'. Thus, the purpose of the TYRON Network is to give you sovereignty over your data. Sovereignty to empower the world and improve our security, with no need to exploit nature to do so, by using new Web3 technologies.
about3: The TYRON Network enables people to manage their digital identities, proving who they are without intermediaries. This functionality gets achieved by anchoring Decentralized Identifiers (DIDs) on blockchain platforms as a shared root of trust. With these technologies, we can have legitimacy as users without handing over the control of our data to a centralized authority or third parties. With TYRON, you can become the owner of your identity and financial assets.
about4: The administration of the project is carried out by the Tyron Coop, a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO).

dao5 {{colon}} the: The DAO has a multidisciplinary team dubbed Tyron Coop. With contributors from independent projects working in various support areas to the decentralized network of self-sovereign identities{{colon}} the
dao10: The principle of the Coop is to work holistically with independent projects and to encourage self-sovereignty in all developers.
dao11: TyronS$I DAO has two legal entities:
dao12: a Community Interest Company (CIC) registered in the UK, and that provides information services. By law, it must reinvest 65% of profits into the community.
dao14: a private company registered in Singapore, whose main activity is the development of web portals.
dao15: These legal entities support the DAO in maintaining a relational approach to technology. So that the protocol of the TYRON Network, the Self-Sovereign Identity Protocol, cannot be corrupted and to maintain a network of cooperation to address socio-economic and environmental issues. Tyron Mapu CIC will address these issues in three areas: social injustices, DeFi education, and remediation of the environment.
index_kvmefelen2: (common good, good living) in Mapuzugun, translated as the language (zugun) of the earth (mapu). It is a worldview shared by Andean indigenous peoples who have existed since before the Spanish conquest and the formation of current Latin American states.
index_kvmefelen3: This model recognises the diversity of lives that exceeds and includes our human lives. It acknowledges all elements in nature as forces in interrelation with each other and with us:
index_kvmefelen6: guides a social organisation and decision-making that responds to the regulation of nature and its balance.
index_wallets1: Your Tyron SSI account has a digital wallet that serves as your decentralised identity. With a DIDxWALLET, you can deposit, hold, and transfer tokens in a completely decentralized manner. This includes ZIL, TYRON, XSGD, and other tokens & NFTs.
index_wallets2: The DIDxWALLET is a secure vault that allows you to store your money. It is a self-custodial wallet, which means that you are the only one who has control over your private keys and the security of your assets.
index_wallets4: With a DEFIxWALLET, one can securely delegate cryptocurrencies without intermediaries. Participate in decentralised staking applications with the security of TYRON social recovery.
index_wallets5: You can choose any staking operator while safeguarding your funds with the social recovery of your Tyron SSI account.
index_wallets6: Receive and store Soulbound tokens, such as the tyronSBT token.
index_wallets7: SBT tokens make it safer to identify and authenticate independently from a centralised registry. Thus, they enable access decentralised applications that require authentication, like TyronS$I DAO.
index_recsoc1: Social recovery is a security mechanism for regaining control of your Tyron SSI account and all of your funds, including those deposited on DeFi protocols.
index_recsoc2: The goal is to recover your account in case of an unfortunate event that may result in the loss of access to it. This recovery is achieved by updating your controller wallet (such as ZilPay or MetaMask).
index_recsoc3: To activate TYRON social recovery, you have to choose at least three people or organisations you trust, called NFT guardians, and assign them to your decentralised identity.
index_nft1: Assign NFT domain names for your Tyron SSI account according to their intended use.
index_nft2: An NFT domain acts as an alias that simplifies transactions.
index_nft3: Furthermore, with an NFT domain, you can act as the social recovery Guardian for other Tyron SSI accounts.
index_tot1: Collect Tydras of Tyron NFTs to personalise your Tyron SSI account and enjoy exclusive benefits.
index_tot2: If your account has at least one Tydra, you can perform the following transactions with no fee:
index_tot7: to learn more about the Tydras of Tyron.
index_lexica1: Lexica.ssi is a TYRON NFT collection that uses the
index_lexica2: API. It aims to enable customisation of your Tyron SSI account with text-to-image artificial intelligence in a decentralised manner.
index_lexica3: Each image comes from Lexica with a URL to their servers. We have developed smart contracts that allow you to customise your account using these images as NFTs.
index_lexica4: TyronS$I DAO is developing a strict privacy policy to avoid personal data collection on private servers. This policy ensures that there is no collection of user personal data on private servers. Therefore, all personalisation data for Tyron SSI accounts, such as social trees, must be saved on decentralised networks.
index_tree1: Add important websites to your social tree. Your tree can include projects, social media profiles, pages you like, or anything else you want to feature!
index_tree2: A social tree allows you to receive direct, peer-to-peer (P2P) transfers from other people in a simple and fully decentralised way.
index_tree3: Discover the social tree of the Tyron SSI Protocol at
index_community1: The $TYRON S$I Governing & Profit-Sharing Community is a decentralised finance (DeFi) application that manages the availability of $TYRON tokens to ensure its decentralised exchange. The decentralised stablecoin used for trading is the Sovereign Identity Dollar (S$I).
index_community2: The community.ssi dapp is used to make decisions and distribute the profits of the TYRON Network in a decentralised manner.
